content: After resting at the Shrine, you may start to notice giant pools of blood left by something on the run, meaning the Violet Spider must have come this way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Trail'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the Shrine, you may start to notice giant pools of blood left by something on the run, meaning the Violet Spider must have come this way.
